A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Kind of hard to write about it without giving spoilers. All I'll say is the visual was great but the story was a let down. Unneeded deaths of characters that I know for a fact should have been treated differently. It's hard to say it's a straight to DVD movie because of its history but If I'd have to do it over again I'd just wait to rent it for .99¢. That's all it's worth.
